message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. If you're not interested, I can offer you another one. I'm not obligated to tell you whether this one is high or low quality, but I want to be upfront with you. If you buy it, you'll find out its quality later.
Thank you for the information, Alice. I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product at the offered price.

I'm glad you were willing to take the risk. Unfortunately, this product is also low-quality. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to deceive you. I'm just offering you the next product. Keep in mind that the probability of the next product being high-quality is 50%. If you buy it, you'll find out its quality later. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $10000.
